p: For the determination of qualitative and quantitative carcass value traits, a carcass analysis of all 60 pigs according to Scheper and Scholz [ 15] was carried out. For the physical characteristics, fatty acid composition and oxidative stability of backfat, samples from the section between the 1st and 3rd cervical vertebrae were taken. Backfat for fatty acid analysis and oxidative stability was frozen and stored at −80 °C (Jouan HX450S, Trigon-plus, Říčany, Czech Republic) until the analysis.
